import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import { useContext } from "react" import { CartContext } from "../../context/CartContext" export const CartItem = (item) => { const { quitarProducto } = useContext(CartContext) return (
Producto Cantidad Unitario Subtotal Quitar
{item.title} {item.cantidad} ${item.price} ${item.cantidad * item.price}
) }
